lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate having a face on the person to whom I am lending and knowing about their circumstances, hopes and aspirations.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a lawyer in private practice with an interest in civil rights law and, later, a lawyer and administrative law judge for the United States Department of Labor

lenders.name: grayson
lenders.loan_because: Helping those in need is our highest moral mission and obligation.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I've been given more opportunities than most.
lenders.occupational_info: Software developer.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: People helping people change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling reusable products to adults who wear diapers.

lenders.name: Pedro Gonzalez
lenders.loan_because:
I wish the best to people who dare to start something new.
[Deseo lo mejor a las personas que se atreven a empezar algo nuevo]
lenders.occupational_info:
I test solar modules so they are safer and have higher energy yields.
[Yo hago experimentos con paneles solares para que sean mas seguros y produzcan mas energia]

lenders.name: Haden Smith
lenders.loan_because: The micro lending concept makes sense to me and it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: it means something to me to be able to give someone a chance to take control of her life.

lenders.name: Annu
lenders.loan_because: With so much economic disparity and political conflict in the world, I believe that those of us who are more fortunate have an obligation to assist, in whatever way possible, those in need. Also, it's exciting to participate in an innovative approach toward philanthropy. Not least of all, it's very rewarding to reach out to someone across the globe and know that you can make a direct difference in improving their lives.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: A little help can make a big difference. People helped me pay for my education. Now, it is my turn to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: je suis prof. soy profesora. I teach children who are 15 and 16 years old. I teach the history of the world. I teach boys and girls. I teach 5 classes in one day. Each class is 55 minutes. Each class has about 30-40 students. I do not teach on Saturdays and Sundays. I do not teach in the summer. I am paid by the local government. My salary is average for an American.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help people with whom I would otherwise never come into contact.  Also I believe the best way to help is to allow people to help themselves.  If microlending can make someone self-sufficient, that is a good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Information Technology for a large company in the education sector.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva helps people create better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise cattle and write a column for my local newspaper every two weeks.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: gotta help
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer.

lenders.name: annette
lenders.loan_because: i am able
lenders.occupational_info: I am an office assistant

lenders.name: Josh and Megan
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ calls us to not only look forward to heaven as a future hope, but to also bring heaven to earth as a present reality.  If we can contribute to bettering someone's life by giving a small donation, we are joining in the mission to reconcile this world to its Creator and aiding in that process of bringing that heavenly Hope into the "here and now".

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a small farm where we grow vegetables, raise chickens for eggs and meat and tend a couple hives of bees.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in microfinance

lenders.name: Kali
lenders.loan_because: It's a convenient way to give back to those in need around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a tech

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.loan_because: we must work to make the world a place we are proud of: a world without poverty, a world full of hope and opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Film and Television

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: it\'s the very least I can do in a world that has been generous to me and less fortunate for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer software that teaches children and adults how to read. My company also provides training to teachers to improve literacy.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I feel that God has called me to lend people money who need it.  I am not rich, but I want to help when I can.  God bless and WORK HARD and you will earn the money you need!  I hope my loan helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.  I teach English to children.

lenders.name: M. MEL
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way of doing "the right thing" and the right lesson to teach our children.

lenders.name: Sheila & Terry
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets you help hard-working people in developing countries to whom small amounts of money mean a lot. Every time a loan is paid off, you get the gift of being able to re-lend to someone else. (In the photo we are at the Three Rivers Dam on the Yangtze River, in China.)
lenders.occupational_info: Terry helps run an organization for people who work at colleges and universities and who are planning for the future of higher (tertiary) education. Sheila is a health and wellness professional.

lenders.name: Thelma
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way of helping others support themselves and contribute to their families and communities.  It also feels good to be part of the global family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a United Methodist clergy person.

lenders.name: BoulderOne
lenders.loan_because: We represents a group of friends from Boulder, Colorado, USA.

lenders.name: Lee and Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to know that I am really directly helping someone start their own business. I started my own business 12 years ago and EVERYONE needs help, no matter how hard you work!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer helping consumers with financial problems. I have been practicing law for 12 years. I have a staff of 8 people and work with my wife Kristen. We have a daughter named Kate who is almost 2 years old.

lenders.name: Dory
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women develop their own business and become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses and government agencies use computers.  I design databases, software applications, and fix problems.

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that are less fortunate then me.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my interior design practice 10 years ago. I feel very fortunate to be working in a profession that I am very passionate about and am able to make a comfortable living at. I am also passionate about helping other people in this world that may not have had the opportunities I have had. I feel a social responsibility to offer as much help as I am capable of to help end poverty and suffering in this world.

lenders.name: Stormy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hard working families buy their first home at a price they can afford.

lenders.name: A. Redd Katt
lenders.loan_because: I'm a capitalist kind of Katt.
lenders.occupational_info: Work is for Bees.

lenders.name: Patsy
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help those who are in need.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the best investment possible.

lenders.name: Jerry Bires
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others trying to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: The company for which I work finds jobs for others.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It\'s important to help others if you can and do your part for our brothers and sisters around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the development of internet services for a national telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Serena
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who weren't lucky enough to be born where I was born.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: jill
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people who didn't finish high school and now want to get theri diplomas

lenders.name: Ed P
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the KIVA concept.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of micro credit and the importance of helping small businesses and hardworking people the world over.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce television programs for the international marketplace. My company shoots and sells its series and specials on 6 continents.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I like enabling others to help themselves, and I enjoy the idea of having every dollar I contribute help multiple entrepreneurs over time.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Link
lenders.loan_because: \"To one who has been given much, much is required.\"  -Jesus (Luke 12:48)
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a team of researchers who want to find ways of helping children with spina bifida and their families.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something worthwhile with my money, because the people on here have amazing stories and because I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in England, currently studying English at degree level.

lenders.name: Villalagunaphuket.com
lenders.loan_because: Satisfaction in helping people help themselves & because we are in a position to.
lenders.occupational_info: Holiday Home in Phuket Thailand

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We're are all in this togeather.

lenders.name: ROBERT
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.  I contribute with this in mind.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping families realize and maintain affordable housing.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: well i'm a little too short on cash at the moment going through school but microfinance is changing and bettering thousands of lives and when i finally get off my ass and get a job i'll be able to help in a small way.

lenders.name: Lizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their goals!
lenders.occupational_info: I write write about the different ways to invest money.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: It's a start.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I study interactions among plants, soil, and soil organisms to better understand how ecosystems work.

lenders.name: David J. Roof
lenders.loan_because: I have complex thoughts about this type of program. I'm not sure that capital will resolve these issues, but I find very few meaningful ways to act.  I hope this has a positive effect on some peoples lives, but I retain a desire for more significant social transformation.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach, research, and write.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a librarian, someone who helps people find information. I also have 4 children who are mostly grown and help with my husband's business.

lenders.name: Economicus
lenders.loan_because: I hate commies

lenders.name: Azita
lenders.loan_because: I like to see the small business owners who try succeed.

lenders.name: Chris Clark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others turn their ideas into reality.

lenders.name: Calvin
lenders.loan_because: empowerment, accountability, and hard work \'lend\' to tacit knowledge of success.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children through adults the fascinations and interelationships of our natural coastal environment.

lenders.name: Eric & Nicole
lenders.loan_because: We can help... the least, the last, and the lost...help themselves

lenders.name: Terrance
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's a great program and means so much to global entrepreneurs who may not have other access to loans.

lenders.name: treevis
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help someone directly. I\'ve received help from generous people over the years and hope to return the favor to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lenders.name: Ariela
lenders.occupational_info: Microfinance

lenders.name: Tom & Jess
lenders.loan_because: We want to support and encourage the entrepreurial efforts of these individuals / groups working to make a living and hopefully get ahead in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Parents of two kids who believe in hard work and paving your own way.  Semper Fi!

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: It feels right
lenders.occupational_info: I work with  teenage kids, we have a great time and we do some community service together and some community building.

lenders.name: Clifford
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves!  If  my small loan will help others to better their life, and the people they love, then I want to be a part of it!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in public health in S.F., CA (USA).  As the Sr. Occupational Therapist in my agency, I work primarily with children in the public school system with long-term physical disabilities, e.g., cerebral palsy, etc., to become more independent and productive with their lives.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Kiva addresses many problems the world currently faces.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It\'s fun!

lenders.name: Samwell
lenders.occupational_info: breathing open systems

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I support small business entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a nonprofit organization in the San Francisco Bay Area called The Bay Citizen.  Our mission is to enhance local civic and community news in the Bay Area and stimulate innovation in journalism.

lenders.name: Reno
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.  People don\'t need a handout but some investment to start a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur myself.  I live in San Francisco adn I am pursuing my dream.  I am running bankrupt in the process but I am sure that one day, it will be a success and I will be proud that I did this.

lenders.name: Allan & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Dom,Erica,Myles&Colby
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way for people to start the process of getting out of poverty.  They feel accomplished by making their own money, and I am more than glad to be part of the process.  Loaning is the easy part, these brave people are doing the real work.  Micro-financing is an innovative idea in the fight against poverty. We need more ideas like this one.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I love the life I have and want others to have a happy life too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children grow and feel good about their future.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because:
Trust that you will all succeed and we will
become stronger together.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a background in building and construction and have managed a number of small businesses. I also work as a consultant to small start up companies.

lenders.name: Wilson Family Fund
lenders.loan_because: This portfolio was established in December 2006 for family investments in lieu of Christmas presents.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Suraiya
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to have a better life and to get the leg up they need to be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I make useful and ornamental things out of steel using a forge (source of fire to soften the metal), as well as hammers and other tools for shaping and joining the metal.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it is a fantastic way to promote economic development through a method which encourages both accountability and entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a trader for an investment bank.

lenders.name: Kiddush HaShem
lenders.loan_because: Reishit Chochmah, Yirat Adonai.  Shema Yisrael, Adonai Eloheinu, Adonai Echad. Adonai Melech, Adonai Malach, Adonai Yimloch. Adonai Li velo ira. Baruch Shem Kevod Malchuto L'Olam Va'Ed.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ehyeh asher ehyeh.  I will be what I will be.
Chochmah - Wisdom,
Binah - Understanding,
Da'at - Knowledge,
Chessed - Kindness,
Gevura - Strength,
Tiferet - Beauty,
Netzach - Victory,
Hod - Awe,
Yesod - Foundation,
Malchut - Kingship.

lenders.name: Michael and Elaine
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing better than sharing what you have.  It's also a great way to teach others how easy it is to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Elaine and I run a non-profit preschool together.  We feel that good education is for everyone and half of the families at our school are on scholarship.  We cater to many different children from different backgrounds.  We have taught children from Israel, Syria, Nepal, Korea, China, Czechoslovakia, Italy, Russia, Ethiopia, Laos, Vietnam, Armenia, Taiwan, Guatemala, Argentina and Japan, many of whom came to us with little or no English.

lenders.name: JoAnna & Mike
lenders.loan_because: These loans are a gift in the name of JoAnna and Mike -- two generous people who work hard to help others make a better stake in the world for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: JoAnna is a Linguistics and English professor at a university in California and Mike is a business man who helps companies merge and grow.

lenders.name: Vladek
lenders.occupational_info: Technology Project Manager

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who strive to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I own our own awards business.

lenders.name: harvey Bobs
lenders.loan_because: cause I want to tackle poverty likea spydar monkey.
lenders.occupational_info: pretty boring. I eat doughnuts on my break. I build go-machines.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people I would never otherwise connect with.  Everyone deserves a chance to create their destiny!
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help protect and restore the environment and economy of the Great Lakes region.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: I believe providing capital to enterprising people with good ideas can help improve the lives of those people and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retiring, I worked as a computer engineer who looked for errors in the design of chips that are used to build personal computers.

lenders.name: Colby Coombs
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Michael A.
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help those who are working to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build tools used in my work place that cut and shape metal parts and mold plastic parts used in the manufacture of my company's finished product, orthopedic braces.

lenders.name: European Textile Collection
lenders.loan_because: This holiday season we wanted to share part of our profits to help those dedicated to our industry around the world.

lenders.name: Kitty and Jim
lenders.loan_because: God is not going to ask us how much money we made, but He will probably ask how we used His blessings to bless others.  We like making a difference around the world, glad someone thought of a concept like Kiva.  It has blessed us to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Kitty has the best jobs in the world: Teaching children to be independent and aiding orphans and vulnerable families in Swaziland through the nonprofit corporation she started:  Pasture Valley Children Missions, (EIN 35-2468924), a 501(c)(3) public charity.  Watch for the release of her new book:  Nonprofit Touchdown:  Winning the 501(c) (3) Game Against IRS (A Playbook for Tax Exempt Status).

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I can help change the world, even if it is in a small way.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Everywhere I travel I meet wonderful people who are struggling to make a living. I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: doris
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to do that for others
lenders.occupational_info: helping people find their own path independent from drugs and alcohol

lenders.name: Irvington High School
lenders.loan_because: My students study the effects of the industrial revolution and globalization, we decided to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: High School Students (Ages 15-18)

lenders.name: Marya
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an experiential educator both in the typical classroom and in the classroom of the wilderness.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: It\'s a great way to give people help growing their businesses. I\'ve had lots of help here in the US over the years and it\'s great to be able to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with non-profit companies helping them get the word out about what they are doing by using the web and things like blogs and podcasts so that other people will learn about and support their work.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ingenuity of small business owners, and the positive impact a successful business has on a community.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I have so much money that I spend on useless things that don\'t matter, and what I have can make a huge difference in other people\'s lives.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each of us needs to make a difference where we can.  Like the little boy throwing starfish back into the see, I do what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop databases to make life easier for those who use them.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by the hard work of the loan applicants.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper, where I write stories about education.

lenders.name: Micheles Granola
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to sustainable change through my life and my business by helping women all over the world improve their lives through self-employment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a food entreprenuer and aspiring social enterpriser! I started a small business selling my handmade granola at a farmers market and now feed hungry granola lovers in six states through partnerships with over 100 natural food retailers including Whole Foods Market.

lenders.name: DJ KaatSkratch
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help fight poverty and suffering and assist people in becoming self-reliant.
lenders.occupational_info: I play music to make people dance and smile.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: It's a great, direct way to help people.  I can give a small amount and watch it change someone's quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research in mental health, specifically looking at sleep disorders.

lenders.name: P.E.A.C.E Club
lenders.loan_because: We believe that teenagers are the world\'s greatest resource, and we want to give back a little bit of what we have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students at a high school outside of Chicago, USA.  We work very hard to get good grades and go to college.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Who doesn't want to be a world financier?
lenders.occupational_info: I spend each day realizing just how little I know.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I am excited at the prospect of helping people make positive changes in their lives; I respect people who work hard and I think hard work should be rewarded.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer networks in law offices; I train legal workers to use case management software.

lenders.name: Heather McDonald
lenders.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneur spirit and ambition.  I know how rewarding it can be to succeed by standing on your own two feet.   With success comes confidence and inner power.
lenders.occupational_info: I primarily work with home technology integration  sales for high-rise towers & residential homes. The integrated technology includes lighting control, Distributed Music, Automated Shades, Surround Sound Cinemas etc. which enables the home owner to control their living environment with the touch of a button.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It is the small things that give me pleasure.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel that as a citizen of the United States I have many more opportunities to enjoy a comfortable life and it is my duty  to share what I have with others who can use it to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to teach.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are our brothers' and sisters' keepers.
lenders.occupational_info: I study medieval and Renaissance art, and am passionate about research and teaching.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is very appropriate for people who do have income to give as much of it as they can away.  The world does have scarce resources, but by sharing generously there is enough for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make computers work for the needs of faculty, staff, researchers and students at the University of California, Irvine.

lenders.name: Jennifer Casey
lenders.loan_because: My conscience demands it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Infopreneur.  I build and maintain websites like WeeksMotorcycle.com, CruiserCompanions.com, PoconoGardening.com and WhatIsTheMatterWithPeople.com.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I admire and want to support those people who are working hard to make a difference in their lives, their businesses, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a printing company in Seattle, Washington (USA).  I am the technology manager.  I take care of all the computers at my company.  I also volunteer at night as an English teacher for refugees who have come to the United States from around the world.\r\n

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I know my money is going directly to the people who need it, and will use it to improve their lives.  They look at the loan as a gesture of friendship, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in Nigeria and I know the difference that a little help can make in peoples lives. I want to give back to people not as fortunate as I have been in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial photography/illustration

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is stupid

lenders.name: thedr9wningman
lenders.loan_because: It is a good investment and it is better to have a local economy make profits locally than to have a corporation take the benefits away from the local area.  Sustainability is what I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that utilities are not lying about the things they do. I measure energy savings and write reports to verify energy savings to oversight committees.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I help those I can...

lenders.name: Prayers Place
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good, while helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies get traffic to their websites on the Internet.

lenders.name: Errol and Heidi
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others provide for their families and achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Anne Marie
lenders.loan_because: My grandparents were immigrants to America, and they came here because of the opportunities available, if you are willing to work. Life was better for my parents.  They were honest hard working people with six children, and we learned how to live our lives by their good examples. Parents are the same all over the world.  They want to provide for the families they love, and give them the opportunity of a better life.  I want to help give someone the chance to achieve this.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee and direct the administrative and financial issues of a research department of a major university.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because it is direct and I know where my donation is going.
lenders.occupational_info: I make functional pottery by hand on a potters wheel. I make several pots from which I donate to designated non-profits. I like to see the connections between me, my customers and others.

lenders.name: Amy & Eric
lenders.loan_because: it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Amy works at a non-profit after-school arts center for children.  Eric is an illustrator who works to design green buildings.

lenders.name: Kelly and her students
lenders.loan_because: I wanted my high school students to participate in an incredible service learning project. Kiva provided that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school Economics teacher at a private school in Hawaii. I have international students as well as students from Hawaii. We learn about many of the things that Kiva represents - entrepreneurship, trade, and banking, to name a few. My students have raised funds to help others and I\'m really proud of their commitment to be a part of Kiva!

lenders.name: Malahki Thorn
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people having the oppurtunity to prosper.  I want to share the oppurtunity that I have been gifted with others looking to better themselves and thier families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am physically disabled and unable to work.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. - Mark Twain

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have a little more than I need.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I wish to contribute to the global effort to help the poor of our planet.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a physician specialized in Psychiatry. I am originally from Colombia and more than 60% of my patients are Hispanic immigrants in a large metropolitan area in the USA.
The loans I made have been with funds I have set aside for Holidays presents at the hospital where I work. All my gift recipients receive a card from me explaining how I chose to spend the money in lieu of conventional presents. In general everybody has been very happy with my decision.

lenders.name: Micah & Kristy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with being born in a middle-class family and having lived in Senegal when younger, I know how a few dollars can go a long ways in the hands of the inventive and resourceful Senegalese and Africans in general.

lenders.name: Soul Aligned
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and wish to provide as much as I can to support other fledgling business owners worldwide.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy providing an opportunity to those who have a vision, the drive and wish to improve their economic well being and the lives around them.
lenders.occupational_info: We invest capital in unique businesses in the US and create value for employees and shareholders.

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because: As a business lawyer, I want to be able to help those fulfill  and realize his/her dream of owing his/her own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a business lawyer who advises and helps privately held, entrepreneurial companies in everything from negotiating contracts to helping them raise money.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: Ask yourself this:    What if the shoe were on the other foot?
lenders.occupational_info: God first. Others second. I am third. (Well.. at least that's the goal. I'm still learning.)

lenders.name: theresa
lenders.loan_because: I saw a television program about Kiva and thought it was a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lenders.name: Evolutionary IT
lenders.loan_because: Traditional lending institutions often overlook many in the world leaving them on the outskirts of economic systems in which they cannot participate.  This access to capital is vital to improving lives, building communities and lessening poverty.  No longer do we have to wait for these changes, we can actively be a part of transforming lives and Kiva.org is a strong step in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: Evolutionary Information Technology is a leading Information Technology firm that has been providing a wide array of IT services for over 15 years. We implement IT best practice, process and innovative thinking to your business problems. Our real world experience has yielded a deep knowledge of IT infrastructures & their applied best practices. We provide a wide range of services for systems, networks, security, open source, disaster recovery, business continuity, and project management.

lenders.name: The Pimiskerns
lenders.loan_because: As a family, we would like to contribute to the successes of other people, to be a part of their dreams and aspirations.  We have been searching for a way to \'make a difference\' and Kiva is such an amazing concept.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: Someone once loaned me money for my business based on the faith he had in my ability to work hard and it made a lot of difference in my life.

lenders.name: Karen, Luis, Max, and Abby
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist those looking to prove what they can do.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others live healthier lives.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I live in the U.S. but travel alot for my job and I see how difficult it can be in other parts of the world to make a living. I am happy to be able to make a small difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I take travelers to Asia (mostly the Himalayan countries) on special interest tours and treks.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in potential.

lenders.name: Sen
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to do some good during my brief time here.

lenders.name: staphnie
lenders.occupational_info: i protect wetlands and streams so that people will have clean water

lenders.name: James and Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ben & Abbi
lenders.loan_because: we can directly help improve the lives of hardworking people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a sign company.  I also have entrepreneurial businesses on the side.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Micro-entrepreneurs need the money to create enterprise, feed their families and add value to the communities in which they live. Most of us who are "getting by" are rich by comparison, so we can afford to be a source of capital.
lenders.occupational_info: System thinker and one who integrates people and ideas; unfortunately, now working in regulatory interface capacity

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way of giving people a helping hand.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: every little bit helps

lenders.name: Zaki & Shelly
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us so that we can bless others.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I believe those of us who have more have a responsibility to help others who need assistance. Pass it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I do what I can  in memory of my mom  who spent her life in service to her family and to others.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Financially sustainable method for increasing economic activity in developing regions.
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate student in department of Biological Engineering at MIT

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: I feel privileged to have the life I have, and I want to help other people improve their lives whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach elementary school children at a public Montessori school.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: When you are fortunate to have adequate resources you must give to those that do not. If each of us reaches out to “the other”, we will find common ground. As an entrepreneur, I very much appreciate the drive exhibited by these individuals. Kiva is wonderful conduit that allows me to reach those I would have never known about in a one-to-one experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a taxi driver, door-to-door book salesmen, a photographer, clothing salesmen, a software developer. My work life has been like a billiard ball that goes one way than another. I bounce from one thing to the next. It all seems to work out.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others out around the world get a chance to do well in business.  If there is a little somthing I can do to help get people started, why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Peace Corps, so my experience there has opened my eyes to the impact even small things can have on people around the world.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: a little help goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I design mechanical systems for commercial and industrial clients helping them effectively spend there money.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: It helps people help themselves

lenders.name: Pakalulu
lenders.loan_because: Help others, giving back, make a difference, improve the world.  I believe a more prosperous world is good for all of us in the long run.  And this is probably the best way to help that I know of.
lenders.occupational_info: I help in making newer and better computers and electronics.

lenders.name: LSAstaff
lenders.loan_because: LSA staff decided to honor one another and, in lieu of exchanging Christmas gifts, fund Kiva microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: Lutheran Services in America is a network of nearly 300 independent Lutheran health and human services organizations across America and in the Caribbean.  This KIVA project is a cooperative effort undertaken by the LSA office staff.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: To teach my children the importance of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help injured people in getting monetary assistance from those who injured them.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It lets me make a difference.

lenders.name: The Osburns
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people that are trying to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their community.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it is important to share our wealth with other countries, especially by helping men and women achieve economic independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I help performing artists in all apsects of their career, from getting them the work to advising them on career paths.

lenders.name: Belladonna
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the words of Edward Everett Hale who said: “I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything I will not refuse to do the something I can do.”

lenders.name: 1st Lutheran Nebr. City
lenders.loan_because: My name is Tim Regler.  I was given $100 dollars by my church in a program called "Pay It Forward".  All loans on this account were funded through that $100 seed money.
lenders.occupational_info: Jesus said  "A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another."  These loans are given as a token of love and peace in the name of Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kasey
lenders.loan_because: I like to help a little, here and there.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  I would hope more people who can loan will help those who want to help themselves and their families be more self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of a large Therapy Network.  My job is to create opportunities for physical, occupational and speech therapists in private practice.

lenders.name: Darin & Janie
lenders.loan_because: I run a business. I know how hard it was to get started. If I didn\'t have a little help I probably wouldn\'t have made it.
lenders.occupational_info: I create advertising

lenders.name: The Rentobalb Family
lenders.loan_because: we all shape the world we live in
lenders.occupational_info: teaching children / designing buildings

lenders.name: jane
lenders.loan_because: it´s a good way to make a tangible difference.  Also, I enjoy having ties to other cultures and other lands.

lenders.name: Bryan & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others get a start

lenders.name: xavier
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in the goodness of world and free markets as the change agent that will bring mankind out from under his rock and into the bright new world of ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers, specifically the Internet to help medium and large businesses find more customers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a fair and equal chance at a happy and healthy life.
lenders.occupational_info: My name is Robert, I'm a student/activist.

lenders.name: Cara Valentino
lenders.loan_because: I believe every person deserves a chance to thrive.

lenders.name: Ronny
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel great to have helped people get a business going and improve their lives. So little can make such a  difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I  transform plain painted walls!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself who has some great advantages here in the US.  I want people around the world to be able to provide for themselves and their family, be safe, healthy and happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always wanted to make the world a better place through my work.  For over 25 years I have worked in the environmental field.  Now I help people find investors or loans for their business ventures.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I don't have alot, but I have enough to help out a little here and there. I  like to see that a few dollars of mine combined with a few dollars from other people can make a difference in one person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day. I look at  insurance contracts, and change the wording where necessary. It's a lot of reading, which is just what I like!

lenders.name: Poker4Pam
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of people that get together from time to time to play some friendly poker. Several years back one of our coworkers, Pam Handrich, passed away from cancer. We were looking for a way to carry on her memory and started raising funds. After a few months we had about $250 saved up and didn't know what to do with it. One of the members of the group suggested we donate it to Kiva and the rest is history. We now donate money at each one of our get-togethers, with the goal being to raise at least $25 to take out a new loan. As these are loans and not gifts, her memory will live on with each loan repayment as we provide another loan.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people who want to work hard to provide better lives for themselves and their families.  Those people deserve the opportunity to shape their lives.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: It's about bringing light to this world which has so much darkness.  I think of the entrepreneurs at Kiva as having small flames of light; the lending that I do provides fuel for that light so that it can grow and illuminate our world.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Leslie
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Remember the Golden Rule.

lenders.name: RICH CHICKS
lenders.loan_because: We believe we all have the human right to pursue prosperity. Just opening a small door of support we help pave a path to a more equal and just society. Let’s face it –it is totally fun to watch people succeed. How many people can say that being a global financier is their hobby?
lenders.occupational_info: We teach women about money.  As a financial education company in the United Stateswe guide women and teens as they transition into a prosperous life.

lenders.name: Duskin
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born into a society where financial freedom is possible through creative intelligence and abundant opportunity.  I am thankful for this gift and would like to extend the possibility to others.

lenders.name: Jo R and Dean Fisher
lenders.loan_because: We're trying to help out other individuals who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Our artwork is based on our observations of all aspects of the natural world. But invite individual interpretations of our artwork over our description of it.

lenders.name: Kirstie
lenders.loan_because: The Olde Pigg steered me here, and why not? Visit him at http://oldwalrus.schraf.com.
lenders.occupational_info: Student of ethnomusicology.

lenders.name: Rose & Wayne
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need and we feel a responsibility to do so.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I believe the power of money, ambition, and hard work will make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Cousin Syndicate
lenders.loan_because: an old song says - one man gathers what another man spills...
lenders.occupational_info: we are cousins in an American family hoping to plant a seed, watch it grow..

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a impact in this world and sharing my resources in the U.S. is a way for me to make a impact.  I don't have much but what i do have can be used to help empower others who have much less than i do.
lenders.occupational_info: Most of what i do is answer the phone for my business, deposit the money we get and i take care of the logistics of our business.

lenders.name: Congregational Church
lenders.loan_because: The Outreach Committee wishes to share it\'s spirit of good work and love with other members of our church family and our community.  Through this opportunity to make loans that change lives, we seek to build new relationships and to \"participate\" directly in the process of renewal and reconciliation of varied cultures.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a church group, of the United Church of Christ (UCC) affiliation.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have lived on four different continents, I know that people around the world are very similar.  We want our lives to be better, and we want some control over our situation.  People who are determined and committed need only a little assistance to make big changes in their lives.  I have been blessed and fortunate in my country, and I feel that this way I can make a difference to a few peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I design parks, football fields, city plazas, and gardens across the United States.

lenders.name: Alice Duffy
lenders.loan_because: I know it can be hard to start some thing new or keep it going.

lenders.name: Jason & Tricia
lenders.loan_because: We saw a television piece about microlending and felt that this was a great way to help others get a new start.
lenders.occupational_info: I program and sell POS (point of sale) systems for a company in Toronto called Atlas POS Systems. It involves cash register and computer-based systems. My wife has a degree in film and is currently looking for work in Toronto.

lenders.name: liz
lenders.loan_because: It\'s great to help others get started on something they want to do. I\'ve pursued similar goals in my life - and have happily succeeded.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who want to comply with Colorado law when someone has died and it is time to distribute his/her property as the decedent directed. I love this work and the clients I meet!

lenders.name: Pomerleau Family
lenders.loan_because: We feel so fortunate, and would like to help others live happier and more prosperous lives. We know from personal experience how hard it can be to start a small business. We like the idea of helping people around the world help themselves.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an infant who is moving quickly into the world of toddlers - basically, I'm one going on three.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that positive change in our world happens through individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on a Master's Degree in Public History.

lenders.name: Hameda
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jesse & James
lenders.loan_because: We believe that the best way to combat poverty around the world is to help entrepreneurs like the ones we are helping to get on their feet and start creating markets, one neighborhood at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: One of us is an attorney, and the other works in real estate.

lenders.name: Gord
lenders.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am compared to others in this world. This is a chance to make a real difference in other people\'s live at a very small cost to me.

lenders.name: des
lenders.loan_because: I admire enterprise
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an assistant professor of philosophy

lenders.name: A.E.C.
lenders.loan_because: it is a good idea and a proactive gift.

lenders.name: janet
lenders.loan_because: i found this page thru matt.org.i\'ve initially loaned as a christmas gift for my father-in-law from juan jose ríos, sinaloa... i\'ll be presenting this gift to him at christmas,\'06.  i\'ll loan again from myself.
lenders.occupational_info: i work at home - what most women of the world do - childcare, cook, clean, etc...\r\n\r\ni love reading as well... during the nursing sessions.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I support hard working and honest people who want to make a positive change.

lenders.name: Saralyn
lenders.loan_because: my cousin gave me this awesome present for our wedding.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: If I am able, I should.  It is very rewarding and it works!
lenders.occupational_info: I work teaching beekeeping skills to young people in a town in Morocco. Also, music lessons, English and French lessons.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to help others.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It does good and comes back to me.\r\nWho could ask for more?
lenders.occupational_info: Never done :^).

lenders.name: Hans-Günter
lenders.loan_because: ...I can. This is a lot better than giving to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work for a German airline.

lenders.name: Ronald  J
lenders.loan_because: This is the most efficient way to make good use of surplus money, even in small amounts, that I have found. The people on the other end of these transactions will change the world. Bet on it; I do.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and helping someone establish or build their businesses makes me feel like I might be making a difference somewhere.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: We can help so much with so small a contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise oil companies on how to prevent pipeline failures.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together and helping one person inevitably helps another, and so on and so on; and that is just perfect!

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I think it's everyone's responsibility to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: The gap between the rich and poor countries is growing.  We cannot depend on our government to assist those in need in poor countries.  The loans they give through the World Bank and IMF often are given as a means of gaining leverage to force poorer governments to provide rich countries with resources (oil, etc.).  With Kiva, I can make a difference that has a trickle down effect on the micro-economy of a particular region.  What\'s more, I'm not providing charity.   I am giving people the tools to succeed and helping them to take control of their own futures.
lenders.occupational_info: My company buys advertising space on many different websites.  We aggregate that inventory and sell it to advertisers with the promise of optimizing their ads to the websites that will provide them with the greatest return.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The need is there and I am here to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair medical equipment. I fix all the things that doctors and nurses break.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can change the world.

lenders.name: Ashley & Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of one world.  When we thrive or suffer, we affect one another.  It's important that we support one another in our dreams and share our resources to make our world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ashley - Leader, Collaborative Strategies at Barrett Values Centre.  We measure values in businesses and nations to support human potential.

Jonathan - Associate Director of Development at American Conservatory Theater.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things look pretty.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It's a small planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I design furniture and interior construction for people\'s homes, including installation of new kitchens and bathrooms.  I also paint, and love art.

lenders.name: Jo-Elle
lenders.loan_because: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.  - Aesop

lenders.name: Class 07-08 Salinas High
lenders.occupation: Students and teacher at Salinas High

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: On the Tzedakah scale this way of providing assistance is top shelf.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to repair the world one step at a time.

lenders.name: AccountAbility
lenders.loan_because:
Our first loans were placed in honor of our clients, instead of gifts at Christmas. As we have added loans,  we are excited to participate in helping small businesses make a difference in lives around the world. 
We firmly believe that micro-lending is a way to give a hand up for those in poverty or on the brink of poverty, while allowing them to maintain their dignity in the process.  And for us, it both broadens our horizons and helps us have a greater understanding of the world we live in--to have a global perspective.
lenders.occupational_info: By helping small businesses account for what they do with their business finances, we assist them in making good business decisions based on good information. Together we work to make their enterprise successful.

lenders.name: Econ 350
lenders.occupation: Money and banking class at Binghamton University
lenders.loan_because: I want my students to learn about the power of micro-lending in alleviating poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to teach socially responsible economics

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: we like to share some of our good fortune

lenders.name: Jon & 1 Thing Ministries
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us. We want to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers and their families about the love of Jesus and what it means to be His disciple.  My group does what it can to be Christ to a hurting community.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to enable people with limited financial resources to secure entrepreneurial loans and change their lives

lenders.name: Ryan Hudson
lenders.loan_because: I see Kiva as the best use of the Internet since, well, EVER. Giving the average person the ability to empower an entrepreneur on another continent via a lending model rather than donation or charity is about as exciting and powerful an idea as I can imagine.
lenders.occupational_info: I can't, it would require elaborate hand gestures.

lenders.name: Paul & Teri
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate the hard work people do to make a living. We appreciate all the people who make the effort to acquire a loan through KIVA which we are sure that this alone is quite an undertaking. We are the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We make maps!

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: Just to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage several different material and process related programs in our aircraft manufacturing firm.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I love that individuals like me have the opportunity to lend money directly to people in need half way around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise the accounts and activities of investment accounts for a financial services company.

lenders.name: amy
lenders.loan_because: I feel like this is an opportunity to make a difference in others lives.  This, in turn, makes a huge impact on my own.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, as I could not live the life I live if not for others helping me.
lenders.occupational_info: Help customer with the product they purchase from the company I work for. Which they have treated me well.

lenders.name: Ross Strategy
lenders.loan_because: We are concerned about our responsibilities in this world and wish to use our collective resources to make a positive change.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a class of business students at the Ross School of Business (University of Michigan) who took a course on the corporation in society.

lenders.name: Christiane
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of 4 young children and I run a sheep farm.  We sell both the wool from our sheep as well as meat and breeding stock.

lenders.name: Oppy
lenders.loan_because:
every responsible person should have access to credit.

"Never doubt that a small group of citizens can change the world.  Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." - Margaret Mead
lenders.occupational_info: I help big non-profit institutions (Foundations, Colleges, etc.) invest their money.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in health psychology at UC Irvine in southern California. I study stress, how stress impacts disease.

lenders.name: katy
lenders.loan_because: I know that even a small amount of money can make a huge difference in someone\'s life.  I have been blessed with tremendous opportunity and feel it is both a pleasure and an obligation to share in a way that might give someone else the opportunity to better their life.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. We cannot count on governments: we must count on one another to make life easier on those who need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures of people trying to show not only what they look like, but who they are.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I’m a dog.  I like to herd things.  My mission in life is to protect the world from evil squirrels.  My favorite food is kitty-roca.  Other than that I like to hoard attention and snuggle as much as possible.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small gestures sometimes produce big results.

lenders.name: Jani-and-Price
lenders.occupational_info: Jani teaches Spanish to American students who are 14-17 years old. Price teaches French to the same age.

lenders.name: Marcie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be unselfish. I feel good knowing I\'m helping someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I lease apartment homes. The apartments are very nice and are in a nice area near Salt Lake City- the capitol of Utah. I get to meet alot of people. I help others to feel comfortable in their new home by answering their questions about the surrounding community. I like my job and am thankful for the opportunity to work here.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women all over the world should empower each other to succeed.  If we can each help just one other person to pull themselves out of poverty and educate their children with hard work and not handouts, then there is hope for the future of our planet to live as one.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small motel in the mountains of northern Montana.  I was a soldier, I am a woman, and I try everyday to try and become a better person.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: i used to live and work in Africa as a journalist and believe that there is a huge amount of entrepreneurial spirit there.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's very important to support and encourage others to become self sufficient and build self confidence and pride within their families and communties.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to adult learners. They are primarily from Mexico. We have two free classes a week, where we learn skills to use in the community.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives, educate their children, and strengthen their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing to young adults at a university. I feel so lucky that I am able to share my talents, and I love helping students to learn such a vital skill.

lenders.name: Kelv
lenders.loan_because: I so love seeing people blessed by the little I have to give. It literally changes lives!
lenders.occupational_info: I write songs to help communicate to people how awesome God is and to help them respond to God with worship, in every circumstance of life.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I feel I have been blessed with a good life.  I hope I can pass on some of my blessings to someone else
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze medical expenses and project future medical costs.  I provide consulting services to business wanting to project future benefit costs.

lenders.name: Xheni
lenders.loan_because: I believe in redistributive justice.\r\n

lenders.name: Taliesin
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without and though I don\'t have much, I want to give what I can so fewer people have to go through that experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my free time studying...for work I copyedit other people\'s writing, which is basically finding mistakes and fixing them.

lenders.name: In Memory of Eric So
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, but am disillusioned with ordinary charity and taxes.rnrnI once read that while we may earn our money in the immediate sense, the circumstances that we were born into and are privileged to enjoy also 'earn' that money for us. I can imagine few things in my life that I could have 'earned' with hard work if I lived in a village where, as Achewood put it, the economy is based on my brother riding a bicycle with no tires past a broken crate.rnrnI hope that all my actions create good in the world, and lessen the bad. I am trying to focus my life through that lens.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my material abundance with others who may not have as much.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell furniture to people at a store in the United States.
